text: Gradaterebra pilsbryi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Aubry U. (1999) Nuove terebre e antichi versi. Ancona: L'Informatore Piceno. 47 pp ==External links== * Fedosov, A. E.; Malcolm, G.; Terryn, Y.; Gorson, J.; Modica, M. V.; Holford, M.; Puillandre, N. (2020). Phylogenetic classification of the family Terebridae (Neogastropoda: Conoidea). Journal of Molluscan Studies Category:Terebridae Category:Gastropods described in 1999
title: Gradaterebra pilsbryi
